item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0300; 07:13AM; 3873 S La Salle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3omkOUn; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters defended the two story building from damage. The fire extended from the detached garage to the storage shed. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E215 E26 E34 RA26 RA34 T15 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0300; 07:01AM; 3873 S La Salle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3omkOUn; Exposition Park; Detached garage, well involved in fire has extended to an adjacent storage shed and is exposing a two story, single family dwelling. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E215 E26 E34 RA26 RA34 T15 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0003; 12:45AM; 1230 S Bonnie Brae St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uwkkPF; Pico-Union; KNOCKDOWN: 93 firefighters extinguished fire on both floors of the large home in 35 minutes. The also fire extended to two exposed structures (one vacant home sustained only minor exterior damage and one occupied home sustained greater damage) prior to extinguishment. Two patients are being evaluated for undetermined injuries (condition unknown at this time).; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E15 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E229 E29 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA11 RA13 RA803 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T29 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0003; 12:10AM; 1230 S Bonnie Brae St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uwkkPF; Pico-Union; Two story, craftsman style home (vacant) with heavy fire showing. Two additional task forces were requested (reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E15 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E229 E29 E3 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA11 RA13 RA803 RA811 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T29 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1610; 08:35PM; 13170 N Gladstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3spD2Wv; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 20 minutes. The original fire extended to a 2nd box truck. The fire was prevented from extending into the exposed strip mall. No injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E298 E7 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1610; 08:15PM; 13170 N Gladstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3spD2Wv; Sylmar; A box truck, well involved in fire, is exposing a one story strip mall. Firefighters are conducting fire attack attack on the truck as well as going to the roof of the exposure to defend it and investigating the interior to ensure no extension. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E298 E7 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1041; 02:42PM; 1365 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GnKuq4; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters conducted forcible entry, cutting through a rolling steel door, to access the interior and located a contents only fire. 35 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to contents and did not extend into the structure itself. The primary and secondary searches were clear with no occupants located. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E15 E210 E215 RA13 RA803 SQ21 T10 T15 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1041; 02:30PM; 1365 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GnKuq4; Downtown; One story (vacant) arched truss roof, commercial building with heavy smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. This building has been used for ventilation training previously, thus has holes already cut into the roof, negating the need for roof operations. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E15 E210 E215 RA13 RA803 SQ21 T10 T15 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0701; 11:17AM; 2229 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gtrxI1; Harvard Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 42 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. Upon arrival, firefighters encountered heavy fire through the roof of the vacant commercial building and a single family dwelling to the rear was exposed. Crews immediately began forcible entry, cutting through steel bars and opening doors to gain access to the blaze within. Simultaneously, firefighters at the rear of the building defended the exposed building from damage, creating a wall of water between the flames and the structure. Once firefighters made access inside the fire structure, they used large diameter hand lines to quickly extinguish the fire. The primary search of the building located no occupants. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC711 E13 E215 E226 E229 E26 E29 RA26 RA826 SQ21 T15 T29; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0701; 11:00AM; 2230 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ALRFHa; Harvard Heights; One story (vacant) commercial building with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC711 E13 E215 E226 E229 E26 RA26 RA826 SQ21 T15 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
